name: Terminal Hacker (Spanish)
description:
Try to hack into your music degrees folders to change your grades. I wrote it in spanish because I wanted to use it with some students.

This is based on the section 2 of the Complete C# Unity Developer 3D. It's not a 3D game, but is useful to review C# fundamentals.

If you want to take a peek at the course, here is the link: https://www.udemy.com/share/101WeyCUYYdVpRRHw=/
